front.div:
Abstract. Mobile IP gets its firm position as a layer-3 mobility protocol for the
3rd generation and beyond the 3rd generation communication system. Never-
theless, due to the security defects caused by adapting MIP for real service,
several systems such as AAA infrastructure have been introduced. On the other
hand, PKI infrastructure is considered to be a core standard infrastructure to
handle the authentication and secure channel for the present and future network.
In this paper, we suggest a secure registration scheme with authentication using
PKI infrastructure. Suggested scheme produces less static key management
overhead compared with legacy scheme and supports the previously deployed
standard authentication infrastructure. Especially, it has a feature that supports
mobile communication system. Secure re-distribution of dynamic session key
using asymmetric key and the optimized authentication roundtrip time for
handoffs shows such a feature.
